movie.title: Chaplin
movie.plot: The biography of Charlie Chaplin, filmmaker extraordinaire. From his formative years in England to his highest successes in America, Charlie's life, work, and loves are followed. While his screen characters were extremely hilarious, the man behind "The Little Tramp" was constantly haunted by a sense of loss.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 16 nominations.

events.title: Charlie Chaplin receives a lifetime achievement award at the Oscars
